properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.auth-headers
properties.description: Configure the headers to be added to auth request headers.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.authority
properties.description: Configure the authority used to authenticate connections to servers.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions (if possible) occurred while the Camel consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. Important: This is only possible if the 3rd party component allows Camel to be alerted if an exception was thrown. Some components handle this internally only, and therefore bridgeErrorHandler is not possible. In other situations we may improve the Camel component to hook into the 3rd party component and make this possible for future releases. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.configuration
properties.description: Component configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.etcd3.Etcd3Configuration type.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.connection-timeout
properties.description: Configure the connection timeout.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the etcd3 component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.endpoints
properties.description: Configure etcd server endpoints using the IPNameResolver.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.from-index
properties.description: The index to watch from

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.headers
properties.description: Configure the headers to be added to http request headers.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.keep-alive-time
properties.description: Configure the interval for gRPC keepalives. The current minimum allowed by gRPC is 10 seconds.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.keep-alive-timeout
properties.description: Configure the timeout for gRPC keepalives.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.key-charset
properties.description: Configure the charset to use for the keys.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.load-balancer-policy
properties.description: Configure etcd load balancer policy.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.max-inbound-message-size
properties.description: Configure the maximum message size allowed for a single gRPC frame.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.namespace
properties.description: Configure the namespace of keys used. / will be treated as no namespace.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.password
properties.description: Configure etcd auth password.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.prefix
properties.description: To apply an action on all the key-value pairs whose key that starts with the target path.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.retry-delay
properties.description: Configure the delay between retries in milliseconds.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.retry-max-delay
properties.description: Configure the max backing off delay between retries in milliseconds.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.retry-max-duration
properties.description: Configure the retries max duration.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.service-path
properties.description: The path to look for service discovery.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.ssl-context
properties.description: Configure SSL/TLS context to use instead of the system default. The option is a io.netty.handler.ssl.SslContext type.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.user-name
properties.description: Configure etcd auth user.

properties.name: camel.component.etcd3.value-charset
properties.description: Configure the charset to use for the values.
